reviews.review: Already lost millions opening cases I highly recommend this game

big cheaters, much smurfs, valve very money hungry :) jk update, still a shit game, valve sucks, the anticheat sucks. ehm the player base generally suck like 90% of the poeople in this game are so fucking salty bcuz they suck so they start cheating bcuz the matching sucks ass.
